thread.title_full: Master Supplements, Inc. reviewed by RG

author: RG
title: RG
text:
It’s great to have a professional relationship with a company that doesn’t use excuse “phones are down so we closed early”..
Sort of reminds me of the “mail must go thru”,
You got it done, even with no phones, Friday…and best yet full moon.
Btw….any research showing relationship between gut bacteria and lunar cycles in humans…?
….could a rotting microbiome alter your perceptions and give doctors more symptoms to mask!
Thanks for the reply and clarity.
